summary.span: 在動態類別上定義及表示方法 (或建構函式)。

span.span: Defines and represents a method (or constructor) on a dynamic class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來完整描述 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，包括名稱、 屬性、 簽章和方法主體的方法。The class is used to fully describe a method in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), including the name, attributes, signature, and method body. 它用於搭配在執行階段建立類別的類別。It is used in conjunction with the class to create classes at runtime. ## 通用的方法和類型成員的方法Global methods and methods as type members 您可以使用反映發出定義全域方法，以及定義為型別成員的方法。You can use reflection emit to define global methods and to define methods as type members. 定義方法的 Api 傳回物件。The APIs that define methods return objects. ### 全域方法Global methods 使用定義全域方法方法，以傳回**MethodBuilder**物件。A global method is defined by using the method, which returns a **MethodBuilder** object. 通用的方法必須是靜態的。Global methods must be static. 如果動態模組包含通用的方法，保存動態模組或包含的動態組件，因為 common language runtime 會延後所有的全域函式之前進行修復的動態模組之前，必須呼叫方法尚未定義。If a dynamic module contains global methods, the method must be called before persisting the dynamic module or the containing dynamic assembly because the common language runtime postpones fixing up the dynamic module until all global functions have been defined. 使用定義的全域的原生方法方法。A global native method is defined by using the method. 平台叫用 (PInvoke) 方法不能宣告抽象或虛擬。Platform invoke (PInvoke) methods must not be declared abstract or virtual. 執行階段集屬性平台叫用方法。The runtime sets the attribute for a platform invoke method. ### 方法的型別成員Methods as members of types 方法，會使用定義為型別成員方法，以傳回物件。A method is defined as a type member by using the method, which returns a object. 方法用來設定參數，或傳回值的名稱和參數屬性。The method is used to set the name and parameter attributes of a parameter, or of the return value. 參數或傳回值，表示這個方法所傳回的物件。The object returned by this method represents a parameter or the return value. 物件可以用於設定封送處理、 設定常數的值，並套用自訂屬性。The object can be used to set the marshaling, to set the constant value, and to apply custom attributes. ## 屬性Attributes 成員列舉型別定義的動態方法的精確字元：Members of the enumeration define the precise character of a dynamic method: - 使用指定的靜態方法屬性。Static methods are specified using the attribute. - 最後兩個方法 （不能覆寫的方法） 會使用指定屬性。Final methods (methods that cannot be overridden) are specified using the attribute. - 使用指定的虛擬方法屬性。Virtual methods are specified using the attribute. - 使用指定的抽象方法屬性。Abstract methods are specified using the attribute. - 數個屬性會決定方法的可視性。Several attributes determine method visibility. 請參閱描述列舉型別。See the description of the enumeration. - 實作多載的運算子的方法，必須設定屬性。Methods that implement overloaded operators must set the attribute. - 完成項必須設定屬性。Finalizers must set the attribute. ## 已知問題Known Issues - 雖然衍生自中, 定義的抽象方法的一些類別中不會完全實作。Although is derived from , some of the abstract methods defined in the class are not fully implemented in . 這些方法會擲回。These methods throw the . 例如方法並未完整實作。For example the method is not fully implemented. 您可以藉由擷取封入的類型使用這些方法上反映或方法。You can reflect on these methods by retrieving the enclosing type using the or methods. - .NET framework 2.0 版開始，支援的自訂修飾詞。Custom modifiers are supported starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0. 較早版本不支援它們。They are not supported in earlier versions. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別來建立動態型別內的方法。The following example uses the class to create a method within a dynamic type. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也可以呼叫多次，指定安全性動作的每個呼叫 (例如`Demand`， `Assert`，和`Deny`) 和一組適用於動作的權限。 can be called several times, with each call specifying a security action (such as `Demand`, `Assert`, and `Deny`) and a set of permissions that the action applies to. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 中，使用套用至方法的宣告式安全性屬性方法會儲存在舊的 XML 中繼資料格式。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a method by using the method are stored in the old XML metadata format. 請參閱發出的宣告式安全性屬性。See Emitting Declarative Security Attributes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何將內容的`AddDeclarativeSecurity`要求方法的呼叫端，具有不受限制的權限。The code sample below illustrates the contextual use of `AddDeclarativeSecurity` to require the caller of a method to have unrestricted permissions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫泛型的方法會將目前的方法。Calling the method makes the current method generic. 沒有任何方法來復原這項變更。There is no way to undo this change. 第二次呼叫這個方法會導致。Calling this method a second time causes an . 泛型方法的類型參數可以稍後擷取使用方法。The type parameters of the generic method can be retrieved later by using the method. 依照慣例，型別參數名稱會是單一的大寫字母。By convention, a type parameter name is a single uppercase letter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more information, see and . 如需泛型型別資訊，請參閱。For information on generic types, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態類型`DemoType`，其中包含動態的泛型方法`DemoMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic type, `DemoType`, which contains the dynamic generic method `DemoMethod`. 這個方法有兩個泛型型別參數，其中之一做為參數，而另一個則為傳回型別。This method has two generic type parameters, one of which is used as a parameter, and the other as the return type. 執行程式碼時，動態組件會儲存為 DemoGenericMethod1.dll，以及可以使用檢查[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。When the code is executed, the dynamic assembly is saved as DemoGenericMethod1.dll, and can be examined using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). > [!NOTE] > 此程式碼範例會產生簡單的方法主體，只會傳回 null 參考。This code example generates a simple method body that merely returns a null reference. 使用多個完整開發的方法主體中建立及使用泛型類型的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 定義泛型方法，使用反映發出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md)。For a code example with a more fully developed method body that creates and uses generic types, see [How to: Define a Generic Method with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md). [!code-cpp[GenericMethodBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GenericMethodBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GenericMethodBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用這個方法所傳回的物件，來設定參數的預設值，或套用自訂屬性。The object returned by this method can be used to set the default value for a parameter or to apply custom attributes. 參數編號從 1 開始，因此`position`為 1，第一個參數。Parameter numbering begins with 1, so `position` is 1 for the first parameter. 如果`position`為零，這個方法會影響傳回的值。If `position` is zero, this method affects the return value. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，例外狀況會擲回如果`position`為零，所以這個方法無法用來修改這些版本中的傳回值的屬性。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an exception is thrown if `position` is zero, so this method cannot be used to modify attributes of the return value in those versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法是靜態的`obj`參數會被忽略。If the method is static, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 對於非靜態方法，`obj`應繼承或宣告方法，而且必須是相同的型別為這個類別的類別的執行個體。For non-static methods, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the method and must be the same type as this class. 如果方法沒有任何參數，值`parameters`應該是`null`。If the method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`. 否則數字、 類型和參數陣列中元素的順序應該與數目、 類型和這個執行個體所反映之方法的參數順序相同。Otherwise the number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the method reflected by this instance. > [!NOTE] > 完全信任的程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可存取，而且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted.

span.span: A representing the generic method constructed from the current generic method definition using the specified generic type arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您要發出動態程式碼時，您可能需要發出呼叫的方法，從所代表的泛型方法定義建構之前已完成封入類型。When you are emitting dynamic code, you might need to emit a call to a method constructed from the generic method definition represented by a , before the enclosing type has been completed. 您可以使用方法用來建立這類建構的方法，和使用發出的呼叫中。You can use the method to create a for such a constructed method, and use the in the emitted call. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立建構的方法，從完整的泛型方法定義中不完整的類型。The following code example creates a constructed method from an incomplete generic method definition in an incomplete type. 此範例會建立使用單一類型的暫時性組件和模組，會將方法加入`M`，並會將方法的泛型型別參數 T using方法。The example creates a transient assembly and module with a single type, adds a method `M`, and makes the method generic by adding a type parameter T using the method. 型別參數可做為方法的參數類型以及為其傳回型別。The type parameter is used as the type of the method's parameter, and also as its return type. 泛型方法定義中未指定主體，但無法完成封入類型。The generic method definition is not given a body, and the enclosing type is not completed. 方法則用來建構的方法設為`M`(`M(Of String)` Visual Basic 中)。The method is then used to make the constructed method `M` (`M(Of String)` in Visual Basic). 範例程式碼有任何輸出，因為子類別的所傳回方法不允許透過其參數的反映。The example code has no output, because the subclass of returned by the method does not allow reflection over its parameters. > [!NOTE] > 另一個使用的程式碼範例，請參閱。For another code example that uses , see . 也廣泛發出使用泛型類型的程式碼時。 is also used extensively when emitting code that uses generic types. 請參閱[如何： 定義泛型方法，使用反映發出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md)。See [How to: Define a Generic Method with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md). [!code-cpp[MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用方法搭配方法中，注意潛在的互動。When you use the method in combination with the method, be aware of potential interactions. 例如，使用方法來加入屬性也會設定旗標。For example, using the method to add the attribute also sets the flag. 如果您後續呼叫方法，旗標會覆寫。If you subsequently call the method, the flag is overwritten. 有兩種方式可避免這個問題：There are two ways to avoid this: - 呼叫方法呼叫之前方法。Call the method before you call the method. 方法一律會接受現有的方法實作旗標。The method always respects existing method implementation flags. - 當您將實作旗標時，呼叫方法來擷取現有的旗標，請使用位元或加入您的旗標，然後再呼叫方法。When you set implementation flags, call the method to retrieve the existing flags, use bitwise OR to add your flag, and then call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何將內容的`SetImplementationFlags`來描述方法主體中的 MSIL 實作的方法。The code sample below illustrates the contextual use of the `SetImplementationFlags` method to describe the implementation of MSIL in a method body. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果參數的類型與數量已知方法定義時，他們可以使用設定的任何多載可接受的參數類型陣列的方法。If the number and types of the parameters are known when the method is defined, they can be set using any overload of the method that accepts an array of parameter types. 不過，泛型方法可以有它的型別由一或多個它自己的泛型型別參數，在定義的方法後無法定義之前的參數。However, a generic method can have parameters whose types are specified by one or more of its own generic type parameters, which cannot be defined until after the method has been defined. 若要設定的參數型別在此情況下使用這個方法。Use this method to set the parameter types in that case. 如果傳回的型別具有選用或必要自訂修飾詞，例如，使用方法多載。If the return type has optional or required custom modifiers, such as , use the method overload. 呼叫這個方法會取代任何使用已設定的參數類型方法。Calling this method replaces any parameter types that were set using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以使方法成為泛型。The following code example uses the method to make a method generic. 方法則可用來指定方法的一個參數，將第一個泛型型別參數所指定型別。The method is used to give the method one parameter, whose type will be specified by the first generic type parameter. 方法用來指定方法的傳回型別，第二個泛型型別參數所指定。The method is used to give the method a return type, specified by the second generic type parameter. 此程式碼是針對提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This code is part of a larger example provided for the method. summary.span: 設定方法簽章，包括傳回型別、參數型別以及傳回型別和參數型別的必要及選擇性自訂修飾詞。

span.span: Sets the method signature, including the return type, the parameter types, and the required and optional custom modifiers of the return type and parameter types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回的型別和數目和類型參數的已知方法定義時，他們可以使用建立的任何多載可接受的參數類型陣列的方法。If the return type and the number and types of the parameters are known when the method is defined, they can be established using any overload of the method that accepts an array of parameter types. 不過，泛型方法可以有它的型別由一或多個它自己的泛型型別參數，在定義的方法後無法定義之前的參數。However, a generic method can have parameters whose types are specified by one or more of its own generic type parameters, which cannot be defined until after the method has been defined. 若要設定的參數型別在此情況下使用這個方法。Use this method to set the parameter types in that case. 如果傳回的型別和參數型別都不具有選用或必要自訂修飾詞，例如，您可以使用和方法。If neither the return type nor the parameter types have optional or required custom modifiers, such as , you can use the and methods. 呼叫這個方法會取代的參數和傳回型別，建立使用方法。Calling this method replaces the parameters and return type established using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含名為具有型別參數的範例為泛型類別的原始程式碼`T`。The following code example contains source code for a generic class named Sample that has a type parameter `T`. 此類別具有名為的欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，和泛型方法`GM`它自己的型別參數， `U`。The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method `GM` with its own type parameter, `U`. 方法`GM`建立的範例中，以取代它自己的型別參數執行個體`U`型別參數的範例中，並將其輸入的參數中`Field`。Method `GM` creates an instance of Sample, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of Sample, and stores its input parameter in `Field`. 這段原始程式碼已編譯，但未使用;您可以檢視與其[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，並比較它與類別所發出的程式碼`Example`。This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`. 類別中的程式碼`Example`示範如何使用中發出泛型的程式碼的方法。The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the method in emitting generic code. `Main`類別的方法`Example`會建立動態組件包含類別，名為`Sample`，並使用方法，以使它成為泛型藉由新增名為的型別參數`T`。The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample`, and uses the method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`. 預設建構函式和一個名為欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，加入至類別`Sample`。A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`. 一種方法`GM`加入此項目，並轉換成泛型方法，使用方法。A method `GM` is added, and turned into a generic method using the method. 型別參數`GM`名為`U`。The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`. 一旦定義型別參數，簽章`GM`新增時，使用方法。Once the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added, using the method. 沒有任何傳回的型別，以及任何必要或自訂修飾詞，因此這個方法的所有參數都都`null`除了`parameterTypes`，可設定此方法唯一參數的型別，此值設為方法的型別參數， `U`。There is no return type, and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`, which sets the type of the only parameter of the method; this is set to the method's type parameter, `U`. 方法的主體會建立建構類型的執行個體`Sample`(`Sample(Of U)` Visual Basic 中)，將指派方法的參數`Field`，然後列印的值`Field`。The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`. 定義空的型別，來保存的進入點方法`Main`。A dummy type is defined, to hold the entry point method `Main`. 本文中`Main`，靜態`GM`建構的泛型型別上叫用方法`Sample`(`Sample(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)，與型別替代`U`。In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type substituted for `U`. 方法用來建立靜態`GM`方法建構的泛型型別`Sample`，而方法可用來建立，可以發出方法呼叫中。The method is used to create a for the static `GM` method of the constructed generic type `Sample`, and the method is then used to create a that can emitted in a method call. 執行程式碼範例時，它會將發出的組件儲存為 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe 中。When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe. 您可以執行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，而且您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)比較發出的程式碼的程式碼與`Sample`編譯成本身的程式碼範例的類別。You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself. [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic/VB/source.vb#1)]
